        public Terrain getTerrain(Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> position)
        Retrieves the terrain in the provided position. Any terrain outside of the physical boundaries of the map is assumed to be wall.
        Parameters:
        position - The position to check.
        Returns:
        The terrain at that logical position.

      • readFromStream

        public static WorldMap readFromStream(java.io.InputStream input)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates a world map based on a provided input file.
        Parameters:
        input - The input stream from which to read the map.
        Returns:
        The world map that was generated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        java.io.EOFException - If an unexpected end of file occurred.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the stream's data is incorrectly formatted.
